Text: The 5th part of The Amulet of Samarkand isn't going on iTunes for me....  Am I doing something wrong or is there something wrong with the file?
The best stories ever, narration of simon jons is what makes this one of the most pleasurable audio book experiences of all ... thanks

Listening to Simon Jones read is like having melted chocolate poured into your ear canals while a shirtless and glistening Swedish masseuse gently massages your brain.  Thank you so much for the upload!
